name: AVCaptureAutoExposureBracketedStillImageSettings
desc: A configuration for defining bracketed photo captures in terms of bias relative to automatic exposure.

items.name: class func autoExposureSettings(exposureTargetBias: Float) -> Self
items.desc: Creates an AVCaptureAutoExposureBracketedStillImageSettings using the specified exposure target bias.

items.name: var exposureTargetBias: Float
items.desc: The exposure bias for the auto exposure bracketed settings
